code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient complains of moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments for 7 weeks. NKDA. patient is a 51 year old white F. she does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 65 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: she does not smoke denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:white F aged 51 ys presents with 3 months history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. pt reports moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. o:Height 64 in, Weight 152 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt presents with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments for 4 weeks. she has a history of Hearing Loss for past 2 years. patient is a 52 yr old white female. o:Height 65 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gabapentin - 1800 mg daily, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
